extendedInfo.description: Tilt Labyrinth:Ball Maze3D is a balanced bowling adventure gameBest Balance GameThe game belongs to the skills and physical mixing.The gameplay is very simple, shaking forum to find a way to get the ball to reach the destination!The game allows you to enjoy super multiple checkpoints,Each has different skills and obstacles blocking the forward.Players must be properly escape these obstacles can successfully break offBowls maze 3D lets you easily play, a relaxed time toChi-Chi GamesKnife King Zombie War Shoot Boss TightRope WalkerSmash FruitCar Parking Experts Fire Electric Pen Sewer Rat RunYou can each level completed? ! Fast download it!Teeter,Tilt,Labyrinth,Ball,Maze,Balance,3D

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sloppy
reviews.comment: There is no option to disable the audio.  The ball often gets stuck at the start of a level and takes a while to start moving.  The ball sometimes falls in holes when it hasn\'t actually touched the hole.  Some level designs are sloppy e.g. gaps that look wide enough for the ball to fit through but are slightly too small.  The app doesn\'t prevent the phone from turning off the screen, so if a level takes more than 30 seconds to complete then the screen will turn off during gameplay.
reviews.author: Chris Schmid

reviews.title: Rubbish DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
reviews.comment: This app is a waste of time, don\'t bother. Grapics and levels are not very 3D, please don\'t waste your time

reviews.title: Worst. Tilt. Game. Ever.
reviews.comment: This has got to be the worst tilt game I have ever played on my phone. The screen is bad, you have a start button at the start of the level to make getting it in one shot even harder, the ball is almost impossible to control and really unresponsive, the list goes on and on. Not worth wasting the time it takes to download this. Stay far far away from this crap game.
reviews.author: Pauline Stout
